Sonic Drive In Complaints&Reviews - Very unprofessional manager behavior Review all Sonic Drive In complaints Sonic Drive In
Posted: 2007-11-05 by Lisa Allen [send email]
Very unprofessional manager behavior Complaint Rating: Tweet I went to sonic the other day by my house and i go there often because my kids love their drinks. As i was ordering i look in and see one of the managers canoodling with one of the carhops. Well i happen to know that girl and she's only 17 and i know he's way above her age limit plus its very unprofessional and i can't believe that the general manager is allowing a 20 something manager who is supossed to set an example for the other employees mess around with another employee who is underage. Comments United States Fast Food Restaurants Share with others: Was the above complaint useful to you?
